metadata.title: Tuesday, 24th November, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    when the rehabilitation of the Kelongwa-Nyoka-Kalulushi road in Kasempa Parliamentary Constituency will be completed; and
(b)    what action has been taken against the contractor who abandoned the project.

(a)    whether the Government has any plans to integrate the non-military personnel who were working under the Rural Roads Unit (RRU) following the takeover of RRU by the Zambia National Service (ZNS); and
(b)    what the benefits of transferring the RRU to ZNS are.
(a)    when the construction of Mkushi District Hospital will be completed and opened to the public;
(b)    what has caused the delay in completing the project; and
(c)    who the contractor for the project is.
